page.title: 05STREETS AND HOUSING
page.content: The{houses}in our square are mostly{council}and{privately owned.} Some of them are{big}and some are {small.} The council houses are {semi-detached.}They all look the same, and they are on a steady slope. The privately owned houses are much bigger and fancier. They are mainly semi-detached. Some of the houses have a{garage,}for a car or a bike, built into the house with quite a long {drive}going up to the garage. The drives are very well made. The houses are made out of{brick, {stone and cement. }There are a few {detached}houses in our area. Most of the houses have a{garden,}some big, some small. The street{lamps}are quite new,{clean}and with their covers still on. Most of the paving stones in the street are in place, and they aren't {littered}with{paper and leaves.}
